name: RTCTrackEvent.receiver
description: The read-only receiver property of the RTCTrackEvent interface indicates the RTCRtpReceiver which is used to receive data containing media for the track to which the event refers.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
